summary: This document is an email correspondence between Vahe Stepanian and Amanda Kirby discussing the transfer of assets related to Jeffrey Epstein. Both individuals are associates at Deutsche Bank, and the email indicates a plan to follow up on the matter after the Thanksgiving holiday.

persons.name: Vahe Stepanian
persons.context: Vahe Stepanian is an associate in Wealth Investment Coverage at Deutsche Bank Securities Inc., involved in discussions about transferring assets related to Epstein.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, participating in the email exchange regarding the asset transfer related to Epstein.

connections.description: Both individuals are associates working at Deutsche Bank, collaborating on matters related to Epstein's assets.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 26th Floor, New York, NY 10154
345 Park Avenue, 27th Floor, New York, NY 10154-0004
keyFacts: The email correspondence is dated November 27, 2013.
Vahe Stepanian and Amanda Kirby are both associates at Deutsche Bank.
The discussion revolves around the transfer of assets related to Jeffrey Epstein.
The email indicates a plan to follow up on the asset transfer after the Thanksgiving holiday.
The document is marked as confidential.
